trans-unit.source: In the ToDoBroadcastReceiver.cs project file, add the following code that defines the PushHandlerService class:

trans-unit.source: Note that this class derives from GcmServiceBase and that the Service attribute must be applied to this class.
trans-unit.target: Note that this class derives from GcmServiceBase and that the Service attribute must be applied to this class.

trans-unit.source: The GcmServiceBase class implements the OnRegistered(), OnUnRegistered(), OnMessage() and OnError() methods.
trans-unit.target: The GcmServiceBase class implements the OnRegistered(), OnUnRegistered(), OnMessage() and OnError() methods.

trans-unit.source: You must override these methods in the PushHandlerService class.
trans-unit.target: You must override these methods in the PushHandlerService class.
